title: Liar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Once per game, you may make a public statement anonymously. This statement has to be a lie.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-This statement is seen to have come from a different role of your choice that is capable of displaying a message to all townies
-3 statements you make during the day must be lies. If they’re not, you’re modkilled. You may not tell the same lie more than once per day
-If a member of the good faction confirms that they believe or agree with one of your lies, you learn their role at the start of the night phase. If multiple people do so, you do not learn which role belongs to who
-If someone points out that what you said is a lie, your role is publicly revealed

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Tell a minimum of 15 lies without being caught

desc:
Post 3406
_They’re not harmful, you see! They just… benefit my own agenda. A little white lie if you will!_
